Entities (Nouns): traditions, values, customs, heritage, norms, languages, symbols, rituals, beliefs
Inputs (Nouns): migration, globalization, media, education, religion, historical events
Processes (Verbs): preserve, express, adapt, influence, celebrate, erode, transmit, interpret
Outputs (Nouns): identity, artistic expression, diversity, misunderstanding, unity, cultural products
Modifiers (Adjectives/Adverbs): traditional, cultural, diverse, sacred, symbolic, rapidly, deeply
Behaviors (Abstract Nouns): adaptability, preservation, emergence, sensitivity, assimilation, rigidity, resilience
Useful Collocations / Idioms: cultural roots, cross-cultural exchange, clash of cultures, cultural melting pot, preserve traditions, cultural identity
